allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: TypeScript userscript for with.is profile copying

- Add TypeScript userscript with profile extraction functionality
- Configure TypeScript compilation and build process
- Add GitHub Actions for automated builds and releases
- Include README with installation and usage instructions

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add MIT license

- Add MIT license file
- Update package.json license field

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix age extraction and introduction formatting

- Separate age and location from profile_main-age-address element
- Remove duplicate "自己紹介文" prefix from introduction
- Add age field to template

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add Pairs.lv support

- Add Pairs.lv URL matching and CSS selectors
- Create common button creation function for both sites
- Implement Pairs.lv profile data extraction logic
- Update template for Pairs.lv specific formatting
- Update version to 1.0.3

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: Improve type definitions with union types

- Split UserData into WithIsUserData and PairsUserData types
- Use union type for UserData with site discriminant
- Move type definitions to beginning of script
- Replace interface with type definitions
- Update generatePrompt to use type-safe pattern matching

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Correct button placement for both sites

- Fix with.is button to be inline with nickname (not on new line)
- Update pairs.lv button insertion to use nickname element
- Restore original button styling for with.is
- Ensure proper button positioning for both sites

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Use stable CSS selectors for pairs.lv based on hierarchy

- Replace dynamic class-based selectors with hierarchical selectors
- Use #dialog-root ID and div hierarchy for stable element targeting
- Add debug logging for selector issues
- Ensure selectors work regardless of dynamic CSS class names

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Use XPath-based CSS selectors for precise element targeting

- Build selectors using XPath path /html/body/div[2]/div/div/div/div[2]/div/div/div[3]/div[1]/div/div[1]/div[3]
- Use nth-child selectors for exact element positioning
- Target nickname element in div:nth-child(3) instead of wrong element
- Ensure button is inserted in correct location

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Add MutationObserver for pairs.lv delayed modal loading

- Implement waitForPairsModal function to handle delayed modal loading
- Use MutationObserver to detect when modal appears in DOM
- Add timeout fallback after 10 seconds
- Add console logging for debugging modal loading status

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Update pairs.lv content selectors based on new XPath paths

- Update MY_TAGS selector to use new XPath: /html/body/div[2]/div/div/div/div[2]/div/div/div[3]/div[2]/div[1]/div
- Update INTRODUCTION selector to use new XPath: /html/body/div[2]/div/div/div/div[2]/div/div/div[3]/div[2]/div[2]/div  
- Update PROFILE_DETAILS selector to use new XPath: /html/body/div[2]/div/div/div/div[2]/div/div/div[3]/div[2]/div[3]/div
- Fix content extraction for all profile sections

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Extract all profile sections with h3 headers and dl content

- Update profile extraction to include all h3 sections (基本情報, 学歴・職種・外見, 恋愛・結婚について, 性格・趣味・生活)
- Add section separators in basicInfo output for better organization
- Extract all dt/dd pairs from each dl element
- Ensure complete profile information is captured

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
